shrimp.name: ColorExclusion
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.rsl_code: #define invertmask_$(invert) #ifdef invertmask_0 $(OutC) = color_exclusion( $(BkgColor), $(FrgColor), clamp( $(weight), 0, 1) ); #else $(OutC) = color_exclusion( $(BkgColor), $(FrgColor), 1 - clamp( $(weight), 0, 1) ); #endif // invertmask #undef invertmask_$(invert)
shrimp.usage: Blends background color "BkgColor" and foreground color "FrgColor" with the "Exclusion" blending mode, using blending amount "weight". The variable "invert" can only be 0 or 1 with no middle values, if it"apos"s set to 0, the weight mask is used as it is, if set to 1, it"apos"s inverted.
